item.title: Ruby on Rails: Adding XSL Processing Instruction with to_xml
item.author: mark@markrichman.com (Mark Richman)
item.description: Style Sheets can be associated with an XML document by using a processing instruction whose target is xml-stylesheet. It looks something like this: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="something.xsl"?> How do we get to_xml to render the XSL processing instruction?
